"I REPEAT!  YOU MINIONS MAY LEAVE NOW WITHOUT A FIGHT." shouted Perseus dow=
n
into the belly of the base.  "Hmmm... what am I thinking we can just turn=
 on
the lights now that we have power.  *keyed his radio* Salveo, lights
pl=
ease."

All up and down the hallway, the interior lights flickered on.  The=
y were
all of the utility light design with an iron cage around them; the o=
nes near
the entrance were damaged however and didn't light up.

Ravenchief=
 suddenly darted off toward the entrance without saying anything.
He hovere=
d close to he ceiling, weapons ready.

"Who goes there?!?"

*Meanwhile....
=
*
"Stasis activation complete."

Kenzo watched as gasses arose from around =
the chamber's door.  It slid open
revealing a metalic blue-colored bot.

"W=
ho are you!?!" the stranger asked.

"You don't show up on the Maximal crew =
roster, so I could ask you the same
thing." replied Kenzo.  "We're the Pasi=
ficus Maximals.... well just the
Maximals now.  Our base was destroyed so w=
e moved in here.  The Silver Wings
are apparently not around anymore."

"Wh=
at?  This base was empty.  I used my access code to get in here and
rest."
=

"You would've been trapped in there a long time if we hadn't come and turn=
ed
on the power."

"No, there was a failsafe.  It would've woken me up when=
 reserve power
started to get low."

Kenzo took a step back and allowed him=
 to step out of the CR chamber.

"Commander Depthcharge, Maximal Security,"=
 he said cordially. extending an
hand.

"Kenzo, I'm this unit's doctor." he=
 replied, shaking his hand.
